name: Clash Breac - Primary School Core Path

ai.summary: A short, easy 0.4 km walk along the Clash Breac - Primary School Core Path in the UK. This compact urban trail is ideal for families or casual walkers seeking a quick outdoor stretch near educational grounds.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat, well-maintained surface typical of core paths; short distance means minimal elevation change and a straightforward stroll.
ai.safety_notes: Stay on the designated path and be mindful of other pedestrians. Watch for road crossings in urban areas and check weather conditions before you go. If the path passes near school grounds, respect privacy and hours. Keep children supervised and carry a charged phone for emergencies.
recommended_gear: Phone with map or navigation app
ai.best_seasons: Year-round; particularly pleasant in mild spring and autumn weather in the UK.
